    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • timeConflict

        public static void timeConflict()
        Method that alerts when there is a time conflict due to existing appointment. This method handles informing the user that the appointment time cannot be chosen due to an existing appointment already scheduled for that time slot.

      • notBusinessHours

        public static void notBusinessHours()

      • appointmentLoginNotification

        public static void appointmentLoginNotification​(int appointmentID,
                                                java.lang.String startTime,
                                                java.lang.String endTime)
        Method that notifies the user of appointment within the next 15 minutes at login. This method handles informing the user if there is an appointment within the next 15 minutes of their login.
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - appointmentID of the appointment scheduled in the next 15 minutes of the user login.
        startTime - start time of the appointment scheduled in the next 15 minutes of the user login.
        endTime - end time of the appointment scheduled in the next 15 minutes of the user login.

      • appointmentNotificationNone

        public static void appointmentNotificationNone()
        Method to inform user that no appointments are coming up in the next 15 minutes. This method handles notifying the user, at login, that there are no upcoming appointments in the next 15 minutes from login.

      • customerError

        public static void customerError​(int errorNum,
                                 javafx.scene.control.TextField fieldname)
        Method to handle errors when adding/modifying customer data. This method will get called with a specified case. Depending on the case integer passed, it will display a different error.
        Parameters:
        errorNum - errorNum is the case number for the error that needs to be displayed.
        fieldname - fieldname is the field that the error is focused on.

      • appointmentDeleteConfirm

        public static boolean appointmentDeleteConfirm()
        Method that handles confirmation of an appointment deletion request. This method will display an confirmation window before it deletes the selected appointment.
        Returns:

      • customerDeleteConfirm

        public static boolean customerDeleteConfirm()
        Method that handles confirmation of a customer deletion request. this method will display a confirmation window before it deletes the selected customer.
        Returns:

      • appointmentSuccessfulDelete

        public static void appointmentSuccessfulDelete​(java.lang.String appointmentType,
                                               int appointmentID)
        Method that handles informing the user that the selected appointment was deleted. This method will let the user know the appointment was deleted and display the appointment ID and type of said appointment.
        Parameters:
        appointmentType - Type of appointment for the deleted appointment.
        appointmentID - Appointment ID of the deleted appointment.

      • customerSuccessfulDelete

        public static void customerSuccessfulDelete​(java.lang.String customerName,
                                            int customerID)
        Method that handles informing the user that the selected customer was deleted. This method will let the user know the customer was deleted and display the customer ID and customer name of said customer.
        Parameters:
        customerName - Name of the customer that was deleted.
        customerID - customerID of the customer that was deleted.

      • appointmentError

        public static void appointmentError()
        Method that displays error due to being unable to delete an appointment. This method notifies the user that the appointment that was suppose to be deleted, could not be.
